Pinyin1: lángláile de gùshi
Chinese1: 狼来了的故事
Translate1: the boy who cried wolf

Pinyin1: céngjīng ， zhèlǐ zhù zhe yīgè fàngyáng de xiǎoháizi
Chinese1: 曾经，这里住着一个放羊的小孩子
Translate1: once upon a time there lived a shepherd boy

Pinyin1: yǒu yītiān ， fàngyáng de xiǎoháizi juéde hěn wúliáo
Chinese1: 有一天，放羊的小孩子觉得很无聊
Translate1: One day, the little child herding sheep was bored

Pinyin1: xiǎng kào zhuōnòng dàjiā lái xúngè kāixīn
Chinese1: 想靠捉弄大家来寻个开心
Translate1: I want to have fun by making fun of everyone

Pinyin1: fàngyáng de xiǎoháizi xiǎngdào le yīgè bànfǎ
Chinese1: 放羊的小孩子想到了一个办法
Translate1: the shepherd boy came up with an idea

Pinyin1: tā chōngzhe shānxià zhèngzài zhòngdì de nóngmín men dàhǎn
Chinese1: 他冲着山下正在种地的农民们大喊
Translate1: He shouted at the farmers who were farming at the foot of the mountain

Pinyin1: “ lángláile ， jiùmìng a ”
Chinese1: “狼来了，救命啊”
Translate1: The wolf is here, help!

Pinyin1: zhèshíhòu ， zhèngzài zhòngdì de nóngmín men ná zhe wǔqì wǎng shānshàng pǎo
Chinese1: 这时候，正在种地的农民们拿着武器往山上跑
Translate1: At this time, the peasants who were farming ran up the mountain with weapons

Pinyin1: yībiān pǎo ， yībiān ānwèi xiǎonánhái
Chinese1: 一边跑，一边安慰小男孩
Translate1: comforting little boy while running

Pinyin1: “ bùyào pà ， wǒmen zhè jiù lái jiù nǐ ”
Chinese1: “不要怕，我们这就来救你”
Translate1: Don't be afraid, we're here to save you

Pinyin1: nóngmín men dū pǎo dào le shāndǐng
Chinese1: 农民们都跑到了山顶
Translate1: The peasants all ran to the top of the mountain

Pinyin1: nóngmín men zuǒgùyòupàn ， yě méiyǒu kàndào láng
Chinese1: 农民们左顾右盼，也没有看到狼
Translate1: Farmer looks around and sees no wolf

Pinyin1: fàngyáng de xiǎoháizi duì zhe nóngmín men hāhādàxiào dào
Chinese1: 放羊的小孩子对着农民们哈哈大笑道
Translate1: The sheep-herding child laughed at the farmers

Pinyin1: “ hāhāhā ， nǐmen shàngdàng le ， gēnběn méiyǒu láng ”
Chinese1: “哈哈哈，你们上当了，根本没有狼”
Translate1: Hahaha, you are fooled, there are no wolves at all

Pinyin1: nóngfū men hěn shēngqì
Chinese1: 农夫们很生气
Translate1: Farmers are angry

Pinyin1: dào le dìèrtiān
Chinese1: 到了第二天
Translate1: on the second day

Pinyin1: fàngyáng de háizi yòu chóngyǎn le zuótiān de shìqing
Chinese1: 放羊的孩子又重演了昨天的事情
Translate1: The shepherd boy repeats what happened yesterday

Pinyin1: nóngfū men dào le shānshàng zhīhòu
Chinese1: 农夫们到了山上之后
Translate1: After the farmers reached the mountain

Pinyin1: háishi méiyǒu kàndào láng de yǐngzi
Chinese1: 还是没有看到狼的影子
Translate1: Still haven't seen the shadow of the wolf

Pinyin1: bèi piàn de nóngmín men duì fàngyáng de xiǎoháizi hěn shēngqì
Chinese1: 被骗的农民们对放羊的小孩子很生气
Translate1: Defrauded farmers are mad at the little ones herding their sheep

Pinyin1: yīnwèi xiǎoháizi yībiàn yībiàn de qīpiàn tāmen
Chinese1: 因为小孩子一遍一遍的欺骗他们
Translate1: Because children lie to them over and over again

Pinyin1: guò le jǐtiān hòu
Chinese1: 过了几天后
Translate1: after a few days

Pinyin1: lángqún zhēnde lái le
Chinese1: 狼群真的来了
Translate1: The wolves are here

Pinyin1: fàngyáng de xiǎoháizi zhège shíhou pīnmìng de jiào dào
Chinese1: 放羊的小孩子这个时候拼命的叫到
Translate1: At this time, the child herding sheep screamed desperately

Pinyin1: “ lángláile ， lángláile ， jiùmìng a ”
Chinese1: “狼来了，狼来了，救命啊”
Translate1: The wolf is here, the wolf is here, help!

Pinyin1: zhège shíhou
Chinese1: 这个时候
Translate1: at this time

Pinyin1: zài shānxià zhòngtián de nóngmín men
Chinese1: 在山下种田的农民们
Translate1: Farmers farming in the mountains

Pinyin1: yǐwéi xiǎoháizi yòu zài qīpiàn tāmen
Chinese1: 以为小孩子又在欺骗他们
Translate1: Farmers think kids are cheating on them again

Pinyin1: nóngmín men jiù méiyǒu zài lǐhuì fàngyáng xiǎo nánzǐ de qiújiù
Chinese1: 农民们就没有再理会放羊小男子的求救
Translate1: The farmers ignored the cry of the little sheep-herding man

Pinyin1: hòulái
Chinese1: 后来
Translate1: later

Pinyin1: fàngyáng de xiǎoháizi de yángqún
Chinese1: 放羊的小孩子的羊群
Translate1: shepherd's flock

Pinyin1: hǎoduō yáng dū bèi lángqún yǎo sǐ le
Chinese1: 好多羊都被狼群咬死了
Translate1: Many sheep were killed by wolves

Pinyin1: hěnduō rén ， tōngguò shuōhuǎng
Chinese1: 很多人，通过说谎
Translate1: many people, by lying

Pinyin1: lái dádào tāmen de mùdì
Chinese1: 来达到他们的目的
Translate1: to achieve their goals

Pinyin1: bùguǎn huǎngyán de chéngdù dà háishi xiǎo
Chinese1: 不管谎言的程度大还是小
Translate1: No matter how big or small the lie

Pinyin1: zài yīdìng chéngdù shàng ， dū shānghài le biéren
Chinese1: 在一定程度上，都伤害了别人
Translate1: To a certain extent, all hurt others

Pinyin1: shuōhuǎng shì yīzhǒng shífēn bù zūnzhòng biéren de xíngwéi
Chinese1: 说谎是一种十分不尊重别人的行为
Translate1: Lying is a very disrespectful behavior
